import axios from'axios';var AuthService=function AuthService(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,AuthService);this.signup=function(username,password){return _this.service.post('/signup',{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.login=function(username,password){return _this.service.post('/login',{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.loggedin=function(){return _this.service.get('/currentUser').then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.logout=function(){return _this.service.post('/logout').then(function(response){return response.data;});};this.service=axios.create({baseURL:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/auth"),withCredentials:true});};export default AuthService;
